meanings.definition: Forming clinkers; undergoing the process of clinkering.
meanings.sent1: The clinkering bricks were hot from the kiln.
meanings.sent2: The clinkering coal created a strong heat.
meanings.sent3: The clinkering rocks looked like little burnt marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: The clinkering metal glowed in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The clinkering glass shards sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The act or process of clinkering.
meanings.sent1: The clinkering of the furnace could be heard throughout the factory.
meanings.sent2: The clinkering of the cement indicated it was setting.
meanings.sent3: The rhythmic clinkering of the train wheels was oddly soothing.
meanings.sent4: The clinkering of the ice cubes in the glass signaled the start of the party.
meanings.sent5: The clinkering of the coins in the jar was music to his ears.
